Room.Name: Hydra's Den
Room.ShortDescription: The large, squarish room is covered with bones of previous victims.
Room.LongDescription: The hydra is a ferocious, five-headed beast of the underworld who feasts on the bones of adventurers who are too curious for their own good. The room is about thirty feet wide and seventy feet long, providing a lot of room for all the treasure the hydra likes to keep, assuming it hasn't been plundered already.
